title: Overlord Movie: Manner Movie
content:
Who knew theater manners could be so dark and twisted in the world of Overlord? This short film is a perfect blend of the series' signature humor and intensity. And the fact that there are slight differences between the two releases just shows how dedicated the production team is to delivering a unique experience for fans. Get ready to see some spooky sneers from Shalltear and maybe even a rare smile. It's time to sit back, relax, and enjoy the manners movie like a true Overlord fan.

I'm sure this is about to bore you out, so here's a little fun fact about rabbits.
Rabbits are actuallyexcellent swimmers! They have been known to swim in lakes and even tread water in order to reach food or escape predators.
